code: import{ActionTypes}from"../constants/action-types";export var setLoaded=function setLoaded(products){return{type:ActionTypes.SET_LOADED,payload:products};};export var setProduct=function setProduct(products){return{type:ActionTypes.SET_PRODUCTS,payload:products};};export var selectedProduct=function selectedProduct(product){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECTED_PRODUCT,payload:product};};
